      • favorExists

        public boolean favorExists(int uid,
                           int commentID)
        从接口复制的说明: CommentFavorDao
        To check whether the user has favored the comment
        指定者:
        favorExists 在接口中 CommentFavorDao
        参数:
        uid - The uid of user
        commentID - The commentID of a comment
        返回:
        If user has favored the comment, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

      • addCommentFavor

        public boolean addCommentFavor(CommentFavor commentFavor)
        从接口复制的说明: CommentFavorDao
        To add a comment favor into database
        指定者:
        addCommentFavor 在接口中 CommentFavorDao
        参数:
        commentFavor - The object entity of comment favor
        返回:
        If adding succeeds, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.

      • deleteCommentFavor

        public boolean deleteCommentFavor(int uid,
                                  int commentID)
        从接口复制的说明: CommentFavorDao
        Delete user's favor for the comment from the database
        指定者:
        deleteCommentFavor 在接口中 CommentFavorDao
        参数:
        uid - User's uid
        commentID - Comment's commentID
        返回:
        If successful, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.
